HHDS - Household Dietary Diversity Score (standalone version)

Source: R/hdds.R
hdds.Rd

HHDS - Household Dietary Diversity Score (standalone version)

Usage

hdds(
  df,
  hdds_cereal = "hdds_ceral",
  hdds_roots = "hdds_roots",
  hdds_legumes = "hdds_legumes",
  hdds_dairy = "hdds_dairy",
  hdds_meat = "hdds_meat",
  hdds_fish = "hdds_fish",
  hdds_egg = "hdds_egg",
  hdds_veg = "hdds_veg",
  hdds_fruits = "hdds_fruits",
  hdds_oil = "hdds_oil",
  hdds_sugar = "hdds_sugar",
  hdds_spices = "hdds_spices",
  level_codes = c("yes", "no", "do_not_know", "prefer_not_to_answer")
)

Arguments

df

A data frame

hdds_cereal

Cereals and grain component column

hdds_roots

Roots and tubers component column

hdds_legumes

Legumes, pulses, and nuts component column

hdds_dairy

Dairy, milk, and others component column

hdds_meat

Meat component column

hdds_fish

Fish and shellfish component column

hdds_egg

Eggs component column

hdds_veg

Vegetables component column

hdds_fruits

Fruits component column

hdds_oil

Oil component column

hdds_sugar

Sugar component column

hdds_spices

Spices component column

level_codes

Character vector of responses codes, including first in the following order: "Yes", "No", "Do not know", "Prefer not to answer", e.g., c("yes", "no", "do_not_know", "prefer_not_to_answer").

Value

Thirteen new columns: each component dummy variable if "Yes" (hdds_*_d) and HDDS score (hdds_score).
